author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Apparently, there's another round of anti-Trump protests "spontaneously" popping up across America today. These are called “Good Trouble Lives On." I say "apparently" because my knowledge of them comes from an activist CEO who organizes them, claiming he turned down $20 million from, quote, “interests aligned with the organizers.”

Adam Swart, the CEO of "Crowds on Demand," made the claim on News Nation. Who is Crowds on Demand? They were involved in the "No Kings Day" protests, among many others (shouts to BizPacReview).

If you need to hire protesters, we can get a c
title: Activist CEO was offered $20 million to stage anti-Trump protest, but he turned the money down
